response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $1,200,000, making it a unique opportunity for you to acquire this remarkable item at a highly favorable rate. We are confident that you will find this offer irresistible and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 950000}
